snippet: The judge who sentenced former dictator Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt to 80 years in prison said the court was “convinced of the intent to destroy the Ixil ethnic group.”
abstract: Guatemalan court finds Gen Efrain Rios Montt, former dictator who ruled Guatemala during one of bloodiest periods of its long civil war, guilty of genocide and crimes against humanity.
lead_paragraph: The judge who sentenced former dictator Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt to 80 years in prison said the court was “convinced of the intent to destroy the Ixil ethnic group.”

headline.seo: Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt of Guatemala Guilty of Genocide
headline.main: Former Leader of Guatemala Is Guilty of Genocide Against Mayan Group
headline.print_headline: Former Leader of Guatemala Is Guilty of Genocide Against Mayan Group

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
